title: 1 BR / 1 BA great for pets! Pet-Friendly Community in Decatur
posting_body: ['1 Bedroom  1 Bathroom | 619 - 636 sq ft | $1124/Month', 'East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Description:', 'The thriving neighborhood of East Decatur is uniquely suited to your apartment needs, offering peace and tranquility while keeping you engaged with the culture and excitement of the greater Atlanta area.', 'You can enjoy a mere 15-minute drive to downtown Decatur and a short 20-minute drive to the airport.', "You'll also have easy access to nearby Atlanta Transit for your commuting needs.", "There's simply no reason not to make these singular Decatur, GA Apartments your new home.", 'Apartment Amenities:', '✓ Air Conditioning', '✓ Cable Ready', '✓ Cozy Fireplaces', '✓ Custom Paint Tone',
